crust innate let's find out what it

the times certain tasks may not interest
you so to avoid boredom you delay in
doing them you put them off for some
other day to progress donate basically
means to put off or delay doing
something to a later date because of
your laziness to put something off to a
future time is an act of procrastination
so when you don't focus on something
that is important and waste your time
doing other things it means you are
procrastinating the habit of
procrastination means delaying something
that requires immediate attention it
also means to continue postponing doing
what one should do immediately but you
keep delaying needlessly we generally
progressed innate you to distraction
laziness or lack of interest in doing
something as the word procrastinate
shows the action of delaying it is a
verb okay now that you know what
procrastinate means let's take a look at
some example sentences to see how you
can use it in your daily conversation
example one the teacher told her class
if you keep procrastinating your
homework you will be punished example 2
after the retirement eric had planned to
learn basic computer skills so he could
write emails but has always
procrastinated his plans example 3
whenever mother asks Rachel about her
wedding plans
she procrastinate the discussion saying
she is yet not ready to get married
example 4 John has been procrastinating
to fix the broken rear taillight of his
car for more than a year example 5 if
you find a suspicious mole on your skin
get it examined right away and do not
procrastinate as it could lead to
something serious
example six Mary always procrastinated
in proposing John and one fine day she
saw him married to someone else
example 7 Alice kept on procrastinating
hitting the gym until one fine day she
found herself weighing beyond 300 pounds
example 8 though thorn us was smart but
his constant procrastination led him to
be late with almost every assignment
example 9 after the age of 40 a pain in
the chest should be examined without

competitive world don't procrastinate in
